SchedulingConstraint.name: SchedulingConstraint
SchedulingConstraint.description: Represents scheduling constraints on each service resource.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the scheduling constraint was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the scheduling constraint was last viewed.

MaxNonstandardShiftsPerMonth.description: The maximum number of non-standard shifts assigned to an agent in a month.

MaxShiftsPerDay.description: The maximum number of shifts an agent can have in a day.

MaxShiftsPerMonth.description: The maximum number of shifts an agent can have in a month.

MaxShiftsPerWeek.description: The maximum number of shifts an agent can have in a week.

MaxWorkingHoursPerDay.description: The maximum number of hours an agent can have in a day.

MaxWorkingHoursPerMonth.description: The maximum number of hours an agent can have in a month.

MaxWorkingHoursPerWeek.description: The maximum number of hours an agent can have in a week.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the scheduling constraint.

RestTimeMinutes.description: The minimum rest time, in minutes, between an agentâ€™s consecutive shifts.
